Translations.Text: Aceal n temdinin i inuqmen lameo n Mass nnsent akked imazanen iS! Neuseb itent leesab uqsie. Naaqeb itent s uaaqeb issexven
Jeoobent lwexda igiten nnsent. D lexsaoa ay d iooa lameo nnsent
Oebbi Ihegga yasen aaaqeb uqsie. Eezzbet i Oebbi a yuaqilen iumnen! Ni$ Oebbi Issers awen d asmekti

Amazan i wen immalen issekniyen n Oebbi iberrzen, iwakken ad Issuffe$, si tillas ar tafat, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Wid iumnen s Oebbi, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Issekcem ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen i lebda. Ni$ Oebbi Igerrez asen ooeeq
Oebbi i Ixelqen ua igenwan, akked tmurt am nitni. Lameo iprusu garasen, iwakken a ppeeoem ar Oebbi Izmer i yal cci, u Oebbi Izzi i yal cci s tmusni
